channel.title: Looking for a team
channel.description:
Basically this board is for assembling a team for game development.
If you're looking for a team (and not assembling one) it'd be nice if you kept your thread title to just "LFT - (position here)", that way those who are assembling teams can post "Looking for _____, ____, ____"
Consider creating a thread in the development board once you have something to show!

item.title: Looking for a team
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Basically this board is for assembling a team for game development.

If you’re looking for a team (and not assembling one) it’d be nice if you kept your thread title to just “LFT - (position here)”, that way those who are assembling teams can post “Looking for _____, ____, ____”

Consider creating a thread in the development board once you have something to show!

Read full topic
